attributes.additional_details:
This is because of strict rules, heavy workloads, limited creativity, peer pressure, long hours of school, lessons that can be stressful. Therefore, we would like these to be implemented.

- Longer holidays 
Extend the summer holidays from 6 to 9 weeks
- Ban school uniforms
Removal of school uniforms will bring more creativity to students
- Phones allowed during break and lunch
So students can feel free to chat and play online.
- Newer mental health support
Helping students that require support.
attributes.background: We want the government to reform school with removal of or new enforcements for all schools to implement more happy students.
